config.title: Hourly price of electricity in Spain (PVPC)

user.title: Tariff selection
user.description:
This sensor uses official API to get [hourly pricing of electricity (PVPC)](https://www.esios.ree.es/es/pvpc) in Spain.
For more precise explanation visit the [integration docs](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/pvpc_hourly_pricing/).

Select the contracted rate based on the number of billing periods per day:
- 1 period: normal
- 2 periods: discrimination (nightly rate)
- 3 periods: electric car (nightly rate of 3 periods)

abort.already_configured: Integration is already configured with an existing sensor with that tariff
